    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaCatenoid, PaClosedPoly, PaConformal, PaConjugate, PaCurvature, PaCurve, PaCycloid, PaDeCasteljau, PaElasticCurve, PaEllipse, PaGeodesic, PaHarmonic, PaHelicoid, PaHodge, PaJuliaSet, PaKleinBottle, PaLantern, PaLIC, PaLife, PaMarchingCubes, PaMaxPrinciple, PaMinesweeper, PaPlatonic, PaPythagoreanTree, PaRotation, PaRungeKutta, PaSmooth, PaSnake, PaSubdivisionCurve, PaSurface, PaSurfCurve, PaTranslation, PaWeierstrass, PaZigZag

    public abstract class PsApplet
extends java.applet.Applet
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Base class for JavaView application applets.

      • init

        public void init()
        Create thread that configures and initializes the viewer, loads system and user projects.
        Overrides:
        init in class java.applet.Applet

      • run

        public void run()
        Configure and initialize the viewer, load system and user projects. One of the user projects may be selected here.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • main

        public static void main(PsApplet va,
        java.lang.String[] args)
        Standalone application support. The main() method acts as the applet's entry point when it is run as a standalone application. It is ignored if the applet is run from within an HTML page.

      • drawMessage

        public void drawMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Set message string to be drawn in applet while loading.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Print info while initializing applet and viewer.
        Overrides:
        paint in class java.awt.Container

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Does clean-up when applet is destroyed by the browser. Here we just close and dispose all our control windows.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class java.applet.Applet

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop viewer, e.g. stop animation if requested
        Overrides:
        stop in class java.applet.Applet

      • startFromThread

        public void startFromThread()
        Start viewer, e.g. start animation if requested. Necessary, if initialization is done in a separate thread. In this case the original applet.start() has no effect.
